input.sentences: there is a big party tonight and i am really excited to be invited
we are having an awesome time with our friends at the party tonight .
i think this party is getting out of hand . i am starting to act silly .
who left their beer bottle on the stove ? this party is out of control
my friend had too much to drink tonight . she is acting crazy .
output.sentences: I was invited to a party tonight.
We'll be having a good time at the party tonight!
My friend was starting to act silly with the party favors after drinking.
Someone left their beer on the stove after the party.
My friends will most likely drink a lot tonight.
